name: Basketball Hoops 2
description:
Hey basketball fans! Hone your basketball shot skills in this great Basketball game - Basketball Hoops 2!

Basketball Hoops 2 offers the ultimate real basketball experience on your mobile device. The game is a fast paced arcade basketball game with an easy to use
but addictive flick screen to shoot control. Try and beat the highest score! The better the player is, the longer they are able to play!

Basketball Hoops 2 is an addictive game designed for real basketball fans of all ages.

Features: 
- Realistic 3D graphics animated player - Easy to use controls - flick screen for more power
- Realistic physics game
